      • setForename

        public void setForename(java.lang.String forename)
        Accessor method to store the forename of a person.
        Parameters:
        forename - - String being the value to store as the forename. The forename can contain only letters.

      • getSurname

      • setSurname

        Accessor method to store the surname of a person.
        Parameters:
        surname - - String being the value to store as surname. The surname can contain only letters.

      • getFullName

        public java.lang.String getFullName()
        Method to retrieve the full name of a person.
        Returns:
        - String being the forename concatenated with a whitespace and the surname.
